Hi

On Wed 26-Feb-2003 at 11:40:22AM +0000, Nic Ferrier wrote:
> 
> It's a long time since I dealt with basic auth... but I thought it
> was possible to send the UNAUTHORIZED response to log the user out
> and then have the user log in again with another username and
> password.

In my experience it doesn't work like that :-(

Personally I do things like adding a . to the domain name to fool
the browser into letting me have another go but this is not an
answer.

Chris
